title: Bike raffle, $1000 look and lease, Up to 7 weeks free, reduced rates.
posting_body: ['1122U', '1122 University Ave., Berkeley, CA, 94702', 'Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'Use this link for more info:', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1100 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Enjoy the sunset from our rooftop deck, with unparalleled bay area views, or collaborate in the Sky Lounge with free WiFi access.', 'Work up a sweat in a well-equipped Fitness Center, or catch a cool breeze in our landscaped Courtyard.', 'Commute with ease to the BART and UC Berkeley and explore a neighborhood bubbling with life and bursting with entertainment.', 'Choose from one of our spacious floorplans, and come home to warm finishes and modern appliances.', 'Comfort meets convenience at 1122U!', '<URL>', 'Pet Policy', 'Dogs and Cats Allowed: Must have current vaccinations, breed restrictions apply.', '•$500 Deposit', '•$50 Monthly Pet Rent', '•2 Pet Limit', 'Income Requirements:', 'Income of 3 times the monthly rent and guarantors income of 5 times the monthly rent.', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'jhS7gh0rkNE']
